tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
After a long search of dental clinic i ended up with KIDS DENTAL HUB, I will highly recommend this clinic (Dr. Devang Shah & Dr. Pankti Shah).
after my visit, I feel you all must visit here for any dental problem.
Its truly friendly, Cost Effective, & No Pain Lolz.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: My experience with Dr Devang Shah was very good. He is very friendly and gives proper advice regarding the treatment. He understands the problem of his patients very carefully and accordingly he treats and suggest medicines. I would also like to recommend to my friends and relatives. Thank you.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Both the Drs knew exactly what they were doing. Instead of just following procedures they made sure that they understood my medical history and treatment was provided accordingly. First experience with them but was  very professional and pleasant. Very happy with the outcome of first session! Will definitely recommend to others!
reply_text: Thank you for your kind words. It means alot to us..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: He was very professional yet quite friendly with the kids. Managed to perform the procedure well within the time. Since he was performing RCT for the kid, he ensured that it's done very carefully and encouraged the kid so that we isn't scared. I am very satisfied with this treatment from him.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: I went for my daughter's treatment for toothache.  Dr.  Devang nicely explained me the treatment  and was very calm with my daughter and managed her behaviour very well. Her toothache and swelling are gone now and my daughter is very positive now because of the friendly and painless treatment by the doctor. I strongly recommend him.

tags: None
review: He charged higher fees for a filling ... one tooth had a only a small spot which was cleaned nd filing was done for which 1200 was charged .... the other tooth had more decay nd same price was charged .... my daughter was in pain and when i asked the doctor to stop he said the procedure cannot be stopped again and again ....
reply_text:
I would request you to consult other paediatric dentist for the charges. The charges don't vary according to the filling size as the procedure remains the same. She was not in pain but was in fear as fillings don't cause any pain so we advise to finish of the procedure as soon as possible.
Take care
